data.actual_result: The Category name is still here, and collapsing/expanding does nothing
data.expected_result: The Category should disappear from the list
data.short_description: Hide Categories trick is not working if you have Administrator or Manage Channels permission
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a server with channels in a category - Mute all the channels of the category - Right Click on the Server Icon and Check Hide Muted Channels
